description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your PostgreSQL databases. It includes replication, locks, and throughput etc...
title: Postgres overview

8ecaee70-640f-46fd-83d9-a4fd18bc66e6.name: table_name
8ecaee70-640f-46fd-83d9-a4fd18bc66e6.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql.table.name') AS table_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'postgresql.operations' AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql.database.name') IN {{.db_name}}
GROUP BY table_name

c66d1581-e5e1-440d-8ff6-ebcf078ab6dd.name: db_name
c66d1581-e5e1-440d-8ff6-ebcf078ab6dd.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql.database.name') AS db_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'postgresql.operations'
GROUP BY db_name

widgets.description: The average number of db insert operations.
widgets.title: Inserts

widgets.description: The average number of db update operations.
widgets.title: Updates

widgets.description: The average number of db delete operations.
widgets.title: Deleted

widgets.description: The average number of db heap-only update operations.
widgets.title: Heap updates
